item.description:
Join us for a wonderful follow up to the movie "Che, the Argentine". Matilde Bolton, a Cubana who has been in the US since the revolution, will share memories (in Spanish) of life in Cuba including the revolution. She will hold a question and answer period after the presentation.

As always, bring some food and/or a beverage to share at a potluck beginning at 7 pm. Senora Bolton will start the presentation about 7:30.

Note: space is limited to 25 people so there is no "maybe"option for the RSVP, only "yes/no".

Questions? Contact Karen at 860-922-7997 or Linda at 860-586-8672

!Hasta prontito!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: My Memories of Cuba, My Home until the Revolution
